alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Orange and north central Osceola Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hunters Creek, or near Celebration, and another strong storm near Buena Ventura Lakes. These storms are nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Bay Lake, Celebration and Buena Ventura Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
